RESOURCE.NAME: Hash Gazetteer
RESOURCE.COMMENT:
A list lookup component implemented by OntoText Lab (www.ontotext.com).
For documentation, download and license agreement please refer to (www.ontotext.com/downloads/index.html#gazetteer).
The licence information is also available in licence.ontotext.html in the lib folder of GATE
